PageTitle: display netstream cache vxlan inner-ip record
FuncDef: The display netstream cache vxlan inner-ip record command displays details about VXLAN flexible flow statistics on a device. The display netstream cache vxlan inner-ip record command displays details about VXLAN flexible flow statistics on a device.
CLIs: display netstream cache vxlan inner-ip record <record-name> [ [ { inbound | outbound } | sourceinterface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } | sourceport <port-number> | sourceip <ip-address> | destinationinterface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } | destinationport <port-number> | destinationip <ip-address> | tos <tos-num> | protocol <protocol-num> ] ] slot <slot-id> [ verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a flexible flow statistics template.
The value must be the name of an existing template on the device.

Specifies the interface name of packets.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the port number of packets.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the IPv4 address of packets.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the ToS value of packets.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 255.

Specifies the protocol type of packets.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 255.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display netstream cache vxlan inner-ip record flex slot 1 verbose
<HUAWEI> display netstream cache  vxlan inner-ip  record  ccc slot 1
ExtraInfo: This command displays real-time statistics on VXLAN flexible flows on the device.
